About Me

Hi there!

My name is Jhonatas Rodrigues Machado. I hold a Bachelor's degree in Computer Science. I am currently working full-time as a Front-End developer on the Oracle Commerce platform at Compass.uol, working as a lead programmer in projects with clients that have a national and global reach in their respective markets. Some projects:

  • Yamaha Motor Brazil
  • Yamaha Nautical
  • Yamaha Riding Academy
  • Osklen Brazil
  • Osklen USA
  • Salon Line
  • etc.

Before starting to work at Compass.uol, I was a freelance developer on web and mobile technologies, as well as a developer of Add-ons for the Firefox browser. I also had the opportunity to develop in several startups and large open-source corporations on products such as Firefox for iOS and Firefox Lockwise.

For the next years, I want with hard and a lot of dedicated work be a great and essential team player at the company where I work, I always looking for the growth of the company and my growth as well. In the future, I want to have the opportunity to lead an innovative team while seeking an extraordinary approach to every single project. As a part of a team, I am always open to challenges and constructive feedback from my teammates and clients as well.

Since 2014, I have been a Core Contributor at Mozilla as a Community Leader in Brazil. When possible, I strengthen the community by developing tools to improve volunteer and staff contributions like SUMO Live Helper. During these years I contributed to Mozilla with the roles of leadership, localization, website administration, and development (Firefox Add-ons and apps for Android and iOS).


Thank you for taking the time to get to know me better.
